title: Suspect arrested in Westwood shooting that killed teen
content:
WESTWOOD, Ohio —
Police have made an arrest in connection to a Cincinnati shooting last week that left a teen dead and a man injured.
Thomas Robinson was arrested Tuesday for allegedly shooting two people at the Western Glen Apartments on Montana Avenue, police said.
Authorities said Joseph Reno Armstrong Jr., 17, was killed in the shooting. A second person was treated for minor injuries and released.
Robinson was arraigned in Hamilton County Wednesday. His bond was set at $1,715,000.
